channel.title: [PI] How do you make a command w/ time limit?
channel.description: Like lets say i want people only to be able to use this command one time per hour, how do i do this?

item.title: [PI] How do you make a command w/ time limit?
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx

item.title: [PI] How do you make a command w/ time limit?
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

You need to have a day, month, hour system. Then you should put in something like lamestarter = 200;

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (lamestarter == 0) { lamestarter = 200; ... ... } else { sendMessage("You need to wait 200 more."); }}

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do you make a command w/ time limit?

item.title: [PI] How do you make a command w/ time limit?
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

you dont, if you want them to be able to do it once, use this for example, maybe mess around with it and make them able to do it a certain amount of times other then that i dont think its possible message me if you find out how though.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 100000);
addItem(392, 10000);
addItem(554, 10000);
addItem(555, 10000);
addItem(556, 10000);
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(557, 10000);
addItem(558, 10000);
addItem(559, 10000);
addItem(560, 10000);
addItem(561, 10000);
addItem(562, 10000);
addItem(563, 10000);
addItem(564, 10000);
addItem(565, 10000);
addItem(566, 10000);
addItem(892, 10000);
addItem(13755, 10000);
addItem(4151, 2);
addItem(5698, 2);
sendMessage(“You Have Started Your Adventure”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " - im sorry im a gay !!");

        }
    }
